data.prayer: Jesus, 2,613,300 people live in the county of Nord. Please, give them 522 new simple churches this year.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nord, Hauts-de-France, France
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 32,110 believers in Nord.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Nord, Hauts-de-France, France.
data.prayer: Father, make yourself real to these new families.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Nord, Hauts-de-France, France.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Nord to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Berber, Imazighen people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help the 32,110 believers in Nord to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Nord, Hauts-de-France, France need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the county of Nord, Hauts-de-France, France has a population of 2,613,300.

We estimate Nord has 32,110 people who might know Jesus, 1,598,085 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 983,104 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Nord, Hauts-de-France, France will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
